colleges.name: College of Agricultural and Environmental Sciences

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Agriculture
courses.description: This program focuses on crop and animal production, agricultural economics, and sustainable farming practices.

course_units.title: Introduction to Agricultural Production
course_units.description: Overview of agricultural production systems and practices.

course_units.title: Agricultural Biochemistry
course_units.description: Biochemical processes in plants and animals relevant to agriculture.

course_units.title: Principles of Crop Production
course_units.description: Fundamental principles of crop production and management.

course_units.title: Principles of Animal Production
course_units.description: Fundamental principles of animal production and management.

course_units.title: Soil Science
course_units.description: Study of soil properties, classification, and management.

course_units.title: Agricultural Mathematics
course_units.description: Mathematical applications in agricultural systems.

course_units.title: Crop Physiology
course_units.description: Physiological processes in crops and their impact on growth and yield.

course_units.title: Animal Nutrition
course_units.description: Principles of animal nutrition and feed formulation.

course_units.title: Pest and Disease Management
course_units.description: Integrated pest and disease management in agricultural systems.

course_units.title: Animal Breeding
course_units.description: Principles and practices of animal breeding and genetics.

course_units.title: Crop Breeding
course_units.description: Principles and practices of crop breeding and improvement.

course_units.title: Agricultural Machinery
course_units.description: Operation and management of agricultural machinery and equipment.

course_units.title: Agroforestry Systems
course_units.description: Integration of trees with crops and livestock in agricultural systems.

course_units.title: Dairy Science and Technology
course_units.description: Production, processing, and management of dairy products.

course_units.title: Postharvest Technology
course_units.description: Handling, storage, and processing of agricultural products after harvest.

course_units.title: Crop Protection
course_units.description: Protection of crops from pests, diseases, and weeds.

course_units.title: Animal Health Management
course_units.description: Management of animal health and disease prevention.

course_units.title: Irrigation and Water Management
course_units.description: Principles and practices of agricultural water management and irrigation systems.

course_units.title: Sustainable Agriculture
course_units.description: Environmentally sound, socially responsible, and economically viable agricultural practices.

course_units.title: Agricultural Research Methods
course_units.description: Research methodologies in agricultural science.

course_units.title: Crop Production Systems
course_units.description: Advanced study of crop production systems and management.

course_units.title: Final Year Project
course_units.description: Independent research project in agricultural production.

course_units.title: Livestock Production Systems
course_units.description: Advanced study of livestock production systems and management.

course_units.title: Agricultural Biotechnology
course_units.description: Applications of biotechnology in agriculture.

courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Agribusiness Management
courses.description: This program integrates agricultural science with business management principles to prepare students for careers in the agricultural business sector.

course_units.title: Principles of Microeconomics

course_units.title: Introduction to Agribusiness

course_units.title: Agricultural Mathematics
course_units.description: Mathematical applications in agricultural economics and business.

course_units.title: Agricultural Marketing

course_units.title: Financial Accounting for Agribusiness

course_units.title: Agricultural Production Economics

course_units.title: Natural Resource Economics

course_units.title: Agricultural Finance
course_units.description: Financial management of agricultural enterprises.

course_units.title: Agricultural Policy
course_units.description: Analysis of agricultural policies and their impacts.

course_units.title: Farm Management
course_units.description: Principles and practices of farm business management.

course_units.title: Agricultural Price Analysis
course_units.description: Analysis of agricultural prices and price determination.

course_units.title: Agribusiness Management
course_units.description: Management of agribusiness enterprises.

course_units.title: Agricultural Value Chain Analysis
course_units.description: Analysis of agricultural value chains and their development.

course_units.description: Independent research project in agribusiness.

course_units.title: International Agricultural Trade

course_units.description: Economic analysis of environmental issues related to agriculture.
